website_summaries.verdict: A great alternative guitar stand for those that are short on floor space. Easily mount the brackets to the wall to hang a stringed instrument.
pros: No-fuss installation – includes hardware needed to mount the hangers
Soft sponge coating on the hangers protects your instrument from accidental scratches
Arm width is adjustable and can rotate to any angle
Expandable to accept most stringed instruments
cons: Users find that the supplied hardware isn't of the best quality

customer_reviews.title: Read before you hang!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that added an extra layer of expression to my office. I would recommend watching a few videos on YouTube on leveling and the proper height to hang your guitars to aesthetically add to your room before you slap it on the wall because once the hanger is mounted, it will be a chore to tear it out of the wall and rehang. So do it on a good day where you feel ambitious and focused.
customer_reviews.author: GLENN HOOD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son needed somewhere to put his guitars, and I happen to come across these. They have worked out perfectly! Very easy to “install”. We’ve not had any trouble with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: BF Massey

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of these. They work as well as any of the high priced hangers. Save yourself some money, for new strings or something, and get these. I don't think you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bountyhunter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my guitar! And hubby used the second one for his axe. He said the installation is super easy and they look very durable
customer_reviews.author: valeriya

customer_reviews.title: Buy. This. One
customer_reviews.text: I hang an acoustic bass guitar on one hanger, and a mandolin on the other. Size is adjustable, and it was easy to install, like my 3 year old nephew could do it. The grip doesn't leave marks like some of the lower quality hangers. It's a pack of 2. I didn't find a better deal cost wise. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I ended up using the type of anchors that get screwed in as oppose to the ones that came with the wall mounts out of convenience. These hangers are definitely long enough (deep enough?) to hang the thickest guitars safety. I have my two Bohemian oil can guitars hanging from these hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough to hold my acoustic and electric guitars.. nice value for the price. Mounted into the studs because I absolutely do not trust wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: BaneTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Just hanged my guitar and it looks amazing, exactly what I expected. The hanger is a perfect fit for the headstock of my guitar and it still keeps the guitar a little away from the wall so it does not get scratched. Price was really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: A great, lightweight mount for my Yamaha acoustic guitar. Was easy to install. My only complaint is having to drill into drywall, and the cleanup after. But that's not really the mounts problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Cholewinski

customer_reviews.title: Great hangars at a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, just find a stud and screw them in. Great design, keeps the guitarrs from slipping off even with effort, and keeps the bodies from bouncing against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: TSanjurjo

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to hold/display a couple of my cooler guitars. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Loved it so much I bought another set.
customer_reviews.author: AK49

customer_reviews.title: these hangers are cool. i hung 4 of my guitars
customer_reviews.text: these hangers are cool. i hung 4 of my guitars, the hangers look nice and tgehooks have padding so my guitars wont get scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: antonio j cedeno

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality at an Affordable Price...
customer_reviews.text: I like the simple look of these wall mounts. I just started playing guitar again and this is going to help me get my collection started.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty nice and my guitar hasn't fallen off yet. I'd say that's a job well done.
customer_reviews.author: Bluechimecho

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Screws were not great, used some bigger ones I had
customer_reviews.author: mistrbll

customer_reviews.title: holds well
customer_reviews.text: the little guitar hanger was super easy to install, looks great and holds our ukulele from Hawaii perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: lee hartsell

customer_reviews.title: Materials in package were not great
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 nice holes to spackle in my wall now and no guitar on my wall. One of the wall plugs worked and the other 3 were terrible. No instructions on recommended bit size didn't really my things easy either.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer R

customer_reviews.title: Difficult install!
customer_reviews.text: The hanging materials that came with this SUCKED! I followed all the directions and watched videos, and still, the plastic anchors were crap! Definitely get your own anchors for the install, the ones included are pretty pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fits all electrics.
customer_reviews.text: Worked on my telecaster and my stratocaster. I trust these to hang my $2k guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, I was looking for a good hook ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, I was looking for a good hook to put a zombie glove on it for a decorative and found one, the movable arms made the glove fit great on it!
customer_reviews.author: Jory P.

customer_reviews.title: fine product
customer_reviews.text: Hold guitars well. No problems yet. Stays firmly in wall. Arms move to accommodate neck placement
customer_reviews.author: Mostly Reign

customer_reviews.title: Guitar Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Work good. Could be a little more firm. They spread a little to easy.
customer_reviews.author: 454Malibu

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friends son for Christmas he really liked them. Its a great gift for that hard to buy guitar player.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: God I love amazon
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised! Very sturdy and seems to do its job accordingly. Definitely would recommend. Phenomenal price for two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It keeps my floor space free and adds art and character to the room at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: MomLife

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super quick shipping. Packaged well. Like how they are adjustable. Easy to install . Good quality too
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Query

customer_reviews.title: but this is a nice wall
customer_reviews.text: My classical guitar is a little hard to get out of this swing because of the wide neck on the guitar, but this is a nice wall hanger
customer_reviews.author: James Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Very descrete and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We use these to hang guitars on the wall and they look great ! They were easy to mount on the wall and hidden when the guitars are hanging up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: it'll do the job
customer_reviews.text: Really don't have nothing bad to say about the product. it's worth the price
customer_reviews.author: pablo Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to install, nice design and great functionality. We recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Guitars look great on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Guitars look great on the wall! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It holds a guitar on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it holds my guitar on the wall. I dislike that it doesn't improve my playing skills.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

product_meta.title: Ohuhu Guitar Hanger 2-Pack Hook Wall Mount Guitar Stand Keeper Holder For Acoustic Electric Guitars
feature_bullets: VERSATILE USAGE: Suitable for a variety of string instruments such as guitars, basses, violins, mandolins, ukuleles and etc.
PROTECTIVE COATING: Soft sponge material ensures no mark, scratch or imprints on your prized string instruments
FUSS-FREE SET-UP: Easy installation with complimentary screws and plastic dry-wall mount
SHOWCASE YOUR COLLECTION: Perfect for displaying your guitars and keeping them off the floor and away from danger
SECURE-FIT GRIP: Adjustable arm width, rotatable and expandable to securely hug any guitar headstock or neck to prevent any unwanted drops or knocks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars204 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
